seed_pair.known: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?
seed_pair.target: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？

practice_phrases: Are you sure
你确定
Are you sure you can
你确定你能
I wanted to know if you are sure
我想知道你确定
Are you sure you know how to say it
你确定你知道怎么说
Are you sure you can help me
你确定你能帮我
I don't know if you are sure you can do it
我不知道你确定你能做
Are you sure you can say that again slowly
你确定你能再慢一点说一遍
Are you sure you can remember what I wanted to say
你确定你能记住我想说的话
My friend wanted to know if you are sure you can help me
我的朋友想知道你确定你能帮我
Are you sure you understand enough different words at the same time
你确定你同时理解足够多不同的词
I don't mind
我不介意
